Verified by code inspection. Michael's comment about the bug from the code: "When running in the suites, we want to avoid intermittent failures so we only flag errors that would result in lost changes". This way the failure won't occur in the tests as long as the CVSTestSetup.FAIL_ON_BAD_DIFF is set to false.
